Pasir Ris West Plaza.
Very stupid design after renovation.
They could have designed the place to be more enviromental friendly. First off they built a high window yet all closed up with barely enough of air circulation. And to have to install large ceiling fan for better circulation whereby there is no necessity as in the past the previous design it was an open air area. Now they even promote atrium indoor cooking and the whole place smells of cooking oil.And we are in a deep fryer.I think the designer thinks it cool for the new design and better facade. Sorry I think the designer or contractor needs to have a better understanding what is call saving electricity. See the photos which is self explanatory.More dumb design these days. So much for efficient designed building.All close up no fresh air circulation.

Our 1st since it had been upgraded.
The food court is well organised but the drink stall service is suck, 2nd person to order the ice kacang but the last to be served.. Three customers had bypass us. Not sure why like that.
Scan this QR code via the Ntuc FairPrice App and get different discounts daily. One day one code only.

Update: sadly they have closed shop.

I'm a regular for the Mamak's Diliyani Dosai inside Koufu.
Cheap Delicious Wholesome sauces.
$1.80 plain / $3 Masala Dosai.
Where to find late at 9pm? Most mamak place won't make fresh ones at night so ots a rare find.
